habtools 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Rugosity

    rg.Rd

    Rugosity

    rg(data, x, y, L, L0, method = "dem", plot = FALSE)

    Arguments

    data

    Digital elevation model in raster format.

    x

    Bottom-left of bounding box.

    y

    Bottom-left of bounding box.

    L

    Bounding box extent (i.e., side length).

    L0

    Grain or resolution of calculation.

    method

    "mesh" or "dem"

    plot

    Add bounding box to plot.

    Value

    Examples

    rg(horseshoe, x=-470, y=1266, L=2, L0=0.5)
#> Error in h(simpleError(msg, call)): error in evaluating the argument 'x' in selecting a method for function 'getValues': 

plot(horseshoe, asp=1)
#> Error in .local(.Object, ...): 
rg(horseshoe, x=-470, y=1266, L=2, L0=0.5, plot=TRUE)
#> Error in h(simpleError(msg, call)): error in evaluating the argument 'x' in selecting a method for function 'getValues': 

rg(mcap, L0 = 0.01, method = "mesh")
#> function (data, x, y, L, L0, method = "dem", plot = FALSE) 
#> {
#>     if (method == "dem") {
#>         if (missing(x)) 
#>             x <- raster::xmin(data)
#>         if (missing(y)) 
#>             y <- raster::ymin(data)
#>         if (missing(L)) 
#>             L <- min(dim(data)[1:2] * raster::res(data))
#>         cells <- expand.grid(x = seq(x, x + L - L0, L0), y = seq(y, 
#>             y + L - L0, L0))
#>         hs <- mapply(hr, x = cells$x, y = cells$y, MoreArgs = list(L = L0, 
#>             data = data, plot = plot))
#>         H0 <- mean(hs)
#>         rg <- sqrt((H0^2)/(2 * L0^2) + 1)
#>     }
#>     if (method == "mesh") {
#>     }
#>     return(rg)
#> }
#> <bytecode: 0x7fcd5be39af0>
#> <environment: namespace:habtools>
